document.full_text: severe flooding and mudslides in southern thailand have killed 21 people, stranded thousands of tourists and threatened to delay shipments of rubber in the world's largest rubber-producing country, authorities said on wednesday.
document.title: flooding in thailand kills 21, strands thousands
lines_and_colors: severe flooding and mudslides in southern thailand have killed 21 people, stranded thousands of tourists and threatened to delay shipments of rubber in the world's largest rubber-producing country, authorities said on wednesday.
